festival.introText:
One Out Festival will take place at Apps Court Farm, Walton-on-Thames, in Surrey, which is a stunning location in the heart of the county with luscious green fields all around and plenty of hidden trails. For one bright, breezy day the festival serves as a getaway and will be showcasing some of the hottest names within dance music. 

Last years lineup was topped off by Hannah Wants and Roger Sanchez, with a whole host of other talent such as Horse Meat Disco and Low Steppa.  For their debut edition last year, there were two bespoke stages of house, disco and dance which brought together artists who are world renown creating a fantastic party in 85 acres of glorious countryside. Situated just 35 minutes from Waterloo station, there’s no excuse to deny yourself a quick escape this year.
festival.descriptionText: Skiddle is an official ticket outlet of One Out Festival 2023. Get One Out Festival tickets, news and information with Skiddle.com

reviews.title: Review of One Out Festival
reviews.body: It was an epic festival. Well organised! Highly reccomemd it!

reviews.title: Review of One Out Festival
reviews.body: Very good event, very well organised, friendly staff, really good line up, stages very well laid out

reviews.title: Review of One Out Festival
reviews.body: Good crowd but sound levels were too quiet at times and you ran out of vodka

faqs.question: How do I get to One Out Festival?
faqs.answer:
Venue Address

Apps Court Farm, Hurst Road, Walton-on-Thames, Surrey, KT12 2EG

 

Shuttle Bus

One Out Festival offers a shuttle bus  service between Apps Court Farm (the venue) and Hampton Court station. 

The service runs from 1pm - 11:30pm.

Tickets for the shuttle bus are £5 and can be purchased at wwww.oneout.co.uk. If you do not purchase the ticket in advance there will be a £10 charge on the day.

 

Arriving by Train

There are many direct trains available from London Waterloo to Hampton Court Station and Walton-on-Thames station. 

 

Trains take between 30-40 minutes.

 

 

 

Arriving by Car

 

If parking at the venue please make sure you have purchased a ticket in advance. When arriving at the venue follow the signs to the car park.

 

If dropping off by car, please enter the venue and turn immediately to the left into the drop-off area.

faqs.question: When is One Out Festival 2023?
faqs.answer: One Out Festival takes place on Saturday 16th September 2023.

faqs.question: Ticket Information & Entry
faqs.answer:
ID & Scanning: 

All tickets will be checked and scanned on entry, please bring a valid form of photo ID. Accepted forms of ID are passports, driving licenses or proof of age cards bearing the ‘PASS’ logo. 

Do I need to print my ticket?

It will speed up entry but it is not compulsory. Having it on your phone is OK too. Do not worry if the name on your ticket does not match the person using it on the day.

Admission policy:

There is a strict ZERO tolerance drugs policy (including Nitrous Oxide), full searches will be carried out before entry is granted, no refunds can be issued and we reserve the right to refuse admission.

 

Searching is a condition of entry: 

We reserve the right to confiscate any item which may not be suitable for the event as well as a danger to others or the venue. Anyone found in possession of illegal substances or contraband goods will be refused admission, ejected from the venue and may also be liable for prosecution. One Out Festival reserves the right to refuse admission to the ticket holder if they display inappropriate or aggressive behaviour, or are intoxicated or under the influence of drugs.

You must not:

take alcohol into the venue

bring glass inside the festival site

bring any corrosive substances

 

bring your own food or drinks into the festival

faqs.question: Carer Tickets?
faqs.answer: For carer tickets, please email info@oneout.co.uk and show a valid PIP document to claim a ticket.

faqs.question: Are pre-payment plan tickets available?
faqs.answer: No, there aren't any payment plans available for this event.

faqs.question: Where is One Out Festival?
faqs.answer:
One Out Festival is held at:

Apps Court Farm

Hurst Road,

Walton-on-Thames, Surrey

KT12 2EG

faqs.question: What happens If I bought a ticket and cannot attend?
faqs.answer:
Unfortunately we can’t issue you with a refund if you can’t make the event due to work commitments or your mates have dropped out. In these circumstances, we advise passing on your tickets privately to avoid losing out on the money spent.

Refunds can only be offered if the event is canceled or postponed, as agreed upon purchase.

faqs.question: What are the entry/exit times for One Out Festival?
faqs.answer: Venue opens at 1pm Early entry ticket holders must enter by 3pm General admission and VIP ticket holders must enter by 4pm Event closes at 11pm When arriving and leaving, please be quiet and respectful. Please respect the environment. Don’t drop litter

faqs.question: Food & Drink at One Out Festival
faqs.answer:
Food

There will be a selection of high quality food available at One Out. These units will be located in the centre of the festival.

 

Bars

Bars can be located next to the main stage & inside the big top stage. Inside the VIP area there will be an exclusive bar for VIP members only.

 

Water

Drinking water can be found at all main bars and is free.

faqs.question: Toilets at One Out Festival
faqs.answer: The venue has multiple toilets around the venue including a large permanent toilet block for those who don't like portaloos. These can we easily found by signage around the venue.

faqs.question: One Out Festival admission policy
faqs.answer:
• There is a strict ZERO tolerance drugs policy (including Nitrous Oxide). Full searches will be carried out before entry is granted and One Out reserve the right to refuse admission. No refunds will be issued if admission is refused.
  • Searching is a condition of entry. One Out reserve the right to confiscate any item which may not be suitable for the event as well as a danger to others or the venue. 
  • Anyone found in possession of illegal substances or contraband goods will be refused admission, ejected from the venue and may also be liable for prosecution. No refunds will be issued.
  • One Out Festival reserves the right to refuse admission to the ticket holder if they display inappropriate or aggressive behaviour, or are intoxicated or under the influence of drugs.
  • You must bring the following into the festival:  alcohol, corrosive substances, food or drink. Tap water is available free of charge in the festival.
  • One Out do not permit re-entry to the event. Once you leave the event, you cannot re-enter.

news.title: One Out Festival announces phase three of lineup ahead of this summer's edition
news.summary: Joining headliners Skream and Eats Everything are specialist selectors, DJ Seinfeld, Prospa, Sam Divine, Latmun, Amyelle, Jess Bays and more...
